description:
This application is an hp webOS based guide to accompany you on your visit to Barcelona. 

It contains an OFFLINE database of points of interest including bars, cafes and museums in Barcelona city. 

It incorporates GPS location services to present the distance and direction to the sights nearest to your current location.


Note, if there are any additions or recommendation you would like to make, please email me rather than leaving negative feedback!! 

Updates are regular and free!

Vamos!
John
versionNote:
Same as the Plus version.
If you like the app, consider helping its upkeep by buying the plus version.
